meanings.sent1: I am uncluttering my room by getting rid of old toys.
meanings.sent2: She spent the weekend uncluttering her closet and donating clothes.
meanings.sent3: Uncluttering the garage revealed a forgotten treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt uncluttered after uncluttering his workspace.
meanings.sent5: Uncluttering the kitchen made it easier to find things.

meanings.definition: Make (something) neat and organized by removing unnecessary items
meanings.sent1: The teacher is uncluttering the classroom to create a better learning environment.
meanings.sent2: Uncluttering the desk helped improve productivity at work.
meanings.sent3: Uncluttering the bookshelf made the books look happier.
meanings.sent4: She felt a sense of accomplishment after uncluttering her digital files.
meanings.sent5: Uncluttering the garden made it more inviting for visitors.
